product_title: soundcore by Anker Q20i Wireless Bluetooth Over-Ear Headphones with Hybrid Active Noise Cancelling, 40h Playtime in ANC Mode, Hi-Res Audio, Deep Bass, Personalization via App (Black)
product_bp: HYBRID ACTIVE NOISE CANCELLING: Thanks to the combination of 2 internal and 2 external microphones, the headphones detect external noise, such as aircraft and car noise, and reduce them extremely effectively by up to 90%.;HIGH PRECISION SOUND PROFILE: Noise cancelling headphones feature dynamic 40mm drivers that produce detailed sound and rich beats with BassUp technology. They are also compatible with Hi-Res certified audio via AUX cable to provide more details.    40 HOURS OF PLAYTIME AND FAST CHARGING: With 40 hours of battery life in ANC mode and 60 hours in normal mode, you can commute undisturbed without worrying about charging. Thanks to the quick charge function, the Q20i only takes 5 minutes of charging time to give you another 4 hours of playtime.    Dual connection: connect to two devices simultaneously via BT 5.0 and switch back and forth effortlessly between them. Audio output is automatically from the device you need, whether you're working on a laptop or want to answer a call.; App for adjusting the equaliser: download the soundcore app to refine the sound with the adjustable EQ and 22 preset options. You can switch between the three modes ANC, Normal and Transparency, and relax with white noise.    ENVIRONMENT SOUND: If you want to consciously perceive your surroundings, such as when you are announcing in public traffic, crossing the road, or simply staying connected to the world around you, simply switch to the transparency mode of your noise cancelling headphones.    HIGH PRECISION SOUND PROFILE: Noise cancelling headphones feature dynamic 40mm drivers that produce detailed sound and rich beats with BassUp technology. They are also compatible with Hi-Res certified audio via AUX cable to provide more details.
product_description: Customers praise these headphones for their awesome sound quality, premium build, and excellent noise cancellation that blocks fan sounds. Moreover, the battery life exceeds 50 hours, and customers appreciate the extra bass mode. They find the headphones comfortable and good value for money, with one customer noting that comfort is particularly good for this price point.

Really good for the price
Reviewed in India on 7 November 2025Colour: BlackVerified Purchase
Honest review , no promotion just an honest buyer1.The noise cancellation is really good , better than others for example when compared to JBl 770 NC just in case if you are wondering2.Sound quality is also very good and an equaliser is also there in the app so you can make adjustments to it , i personally love the bass booster3.And it is comfortable to wear,soft paddings, adjustable4.And transparency mode is good if you want to walk outside so that you are aware of the surroundingsIn total there is no such things to point out honestly cause even in low volume i can literally enjoy music very well as compared to earpods and others5. Easily connects to two devices like you won't even know when its connected it's that fast6. Design is not bad7. Soundcore app has great features even on the right ear cup all the buttons are there so no need to open app again and again to change settings or increase volumeDon't have anything else to sayWrote this review just in case you are confused about which one to buy , like I was confused between noise airmax5 jbl 770 nc and soundcoreGlad i bought this oneAnother suggestion. Report
Ahk4.0 out of 5 stars
Good anc , amazing sound quality
Reviewed in India on 27 July 2024Colour: BlackVerified Purchase
Bought it 1 week ago , charged once , i use it hardly 2hrs a day with anc on all times, so didnt need to charge it again yet !! I use it in gym so sometime it slips while doing some exercises !! Anc is amazing as it blocks all the gym background noise of people talking , weights banging and gym speakers sound . Transparency mode is v bad as it ruins the sound quality !! Normal mode provides the best sound quality but it also reduces somewhat of the background noise !! 3.5mm cable provided in box is of low quality so i bought new ptron brand 3.5mm cable from amazon as i use it wired for gaming !! Works amazingly goood for gaming in WIRED MODE !! Also audio quality is far better in wired mode but theres no noise cancellation available in wired mode  !! Worth it for 3999/- A case for protecting those headphones shoudlve been provided as wireless headphones are fragile no matter what brand you buy !! Didnt choose its competitor Jbl660nc as that headphone doesnt have app support but soundcore headphone has a smooth helpful app . Also weight is less and connectivity issues are nonexistent !! You can go for it no doubtUpdate : 08-08-2024 . On 29th July , 2 days after recieving the product , wired mode stopped working , as i had bought other 3.5mm cable for it , it didnt work w the headphones , also the original cable also didnt work with the headphones !! i used both the cables with my redmi phone and both of them cables were working , so the headphones were at fault and werent working in wired mode !! so on 29th July itself i placed a REPLACEMENT ORDER . the replacement product shouldve arrived on 2nd JULY before 10PM . At 9;40pm on 2nd july i got a call from delivery agent saying his tire is punctured and that he cant come on 2nd july so he will come on 3rd july before afternoon !! He didnt come before afternoon and then stopped recieving my calls and then later marked the replacement as rejected by the customer FYI < I HAVENT REJECTED ANYTHING !! After this i have talked to 5 amazon representatives on helpline number who PROMISED ME that i will get my replacement on 4th July !! Ofc on 4th july again at 9:30PM i got call from AMAZON DELIVERY HEAD of our area saying that my package will arrive on 5th july !! and that lady called mansi who apparently works for amazon , right after the call ended she herself marked the replacement again as rejected by the customer !! this time i got v angry , i called helpline again , and this time they said that due to rejecting parcels many times, replacement cant occur and now i have to give it return and get refund !! thankfully i gave return and got refund on time !! but my point is , i have been prime member since 2019 and i havent ever recieved or faced such liar delivery agent and area head managers before !! they all lied and blamed it on me that im rejecting the parcels !! this is so wrong from amazon !! im not blaming anker at all , i have anker charger , charging cable and i know their after sales service is good and also the headphones can be faulty i accept , but amazon has ruined the experience for me !! now before buying any tech product from amazon ill think twice !!
